topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53855d1f636872367f460000#post_53855d1f636872367f460000
If you're asking me, I can't help you


"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53855d8063687238544a0000#post_53855d8063687238544a0000
*Episode 1 - Alpha Arrives*

*Trashboat is driving down the road on his motorbike*

*Something is watching in the shadows*

*Meanwhile*

Lord Randomsaur! Great news! We've found a man worthy of becoming the leader of the army!

Good, Send my footsoldiers and Arachosaur in and Capture him!

Yes sir!

*They capture him easily*

What? Where am I!?

Hahaha! You're in my lair of course

Who are you!

I am Lord Randomsaur, And I have chosen you to lead my Army of Dinosaur men!

But why!?

So I can Conquer the earth of course! Now just hold still, This will only hurt a bit...

*An explosion rocks the lab*

What!?

*The locks undo themselves*

*He runs past randomsaur and Heads out of the building*

*Along the way, He manages to easily deal with some of the footsoldiers, He's clearly not human anymore*

*He's now in the middle of the forest*

W-What am I?

*Eyecatch*

*Commercial break begins now*
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53855f736368723854d10000#post_53855f736368723854d10000
Meh, I'm far more excited that we could have a cold-resistant hairy elephant with some mammoth genes in it in THREE YEARS. Or at least an embryo, which could then be planted into an Asian elephant surrogate mother.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5385603d63687239f43e0100#post_5385603d63687239f43e0100
Of course we can't get all of your character in one scene!

*Commercial break ends*

*Eyecatch*

*He managed to make it to a city*

What now? What am I supposed to do now that I'm not human anymore?

*A loud crash is heard*

*The prehistoric spiderman from earlier is Wrecking stuff*

*Conveniently, His dad is nearby, And the Spiderman kills him*

Nooooooo!!

Grrrr... This is unforgivable!

Henshin!!

*Insert transformation sequence here*

Hold It!

*The spiderman stops*

You bastard...Who are you!

I am the man who will end the age of the dinosaurs, Kamen rider...Alpha!

*It spits web at him*

*He leaps over it*

*They exchange blows*

Rider Kick!

*He kicks the spiderman so hard that he explodes*

I now know What I must do, I must Stop Randomsaur, And Save the world and the People from his tyranny!

*To be continued*

*End credits*

*Next episode preview begins*

_Now Kamen rider Alpha, Trashboat Continues the fight against Randomsaur's dinosaur empire, Along with his new Superbike "The Air battler" Watch as Kamen rider Alpha Uncovers the Mystery of the prehistoric Batman! Next time... "Come here! Air battler!"_
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184
